name: TrueFruits
description:
A short student game developed at RMIT Melbourne Campus in Unity, using C#. 

4 Player 'Party Style' game inspired by Mastermind.

Roles:

Dion Pirotta: Producer / Second Programmer

Veronica Chu: Creative Director / Artist

Benjamin Le: Main Programmer

Raivis Su: Sound Design / Playtest Lead

[Suggested Device is Samsung Galaxy S8, 2960x1440]
